homens.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE, pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label. ?retrata rdfs:label  ?retrata_label.} VALUES ?retrata {wd:Q8441 wd:Q3010 wd:Q9238344 wd:Q177232} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470. ?item wdt:P18 ?imagem_. ?item wdt:P180 ?retrata. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label

BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label

BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label

BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label

pessoas_conhecidas.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE, pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label. ?retrata rdfs:label  ?retrata_label.} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470. ?item wdt:P18 ?imagem_. ?item wdt:P180 ?retrata. ?retrata wdt:P31 wd:Q5. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label

tudo.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE, pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label. ?retrata rdfs:label  ?retrata_label.} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470. ?item wdt:P18 ?imagem_. ?item wdt:P180 ?retrata. ?retrata wdt:P279* wd:Q795052. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label

Metadados.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?obra_qid ?obra_label ?obra_descr (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?instancia_qid,'@',?instancia_label));separator=';') AS ?instancia) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?criador_qid,'@',?criador_label));separator=';') AS ?criador) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?material_qid,'@',?material_label));separator=';') AS ?material) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?encomendador_qid,'@',?encomendador_label));separator=';') AS ?encomendador) (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) (SAMPLE(?audio) AS ?audio) (SAMPLE(?data) AS ?data) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?instancia_ rdfs:label ?instancia_label. ?criador_ rdfs:label ?criador_label. ?obra rdfs:label ?obra_label. ?obra schema:description ?obra_descr. ?material_ rdfs:label ?material_label. ?encomendador_ rdfs:label ?encomendador_label.} BIND(wd:QIDDAOBRA AS ?obra) BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?obra), 32 ) AS ?obra_qid) ?obra wdt:P18 ?imagem_. BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) OPTIONAL {?obra wdt:P989 ?audio_. BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?audio_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?audio)} OPTIONAL {?obra wdt:P31 ?instancia_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?instancia_), 32 ) AS ?instancia_qid)} OPTIONAL {?obra wdt:P170 ?criador_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?criador_), 32 ) AS ?criador_qid)} OPTIONAL {?obra wdt:P571 ?data_; (p:P571/psv:P571) ?data_aux. ?data_aux wikibase:timeValue ?data_value; wikibase:timePrecision ?data_precision. BIND(CONCAT(STR(YEAR(?data_value)), '-', STR(MONTH(?data_value)), '-', STR(DAY(?data_value)), '-', STR(?data_precision)) AS ?data)} OPTIONAL {?obra wdt:P186 ?material_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?material_), 32 ) AS ?material_qid)} OPTIONAL {?obra wdt:P88 ?encomendador_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?encomendador_), 32 ) AS ?encomendador_qid)} } GROUP BY ?obra_qid ?obra_label ?obra_descr ?instancia ?criador ?material ?encomendador

Retratas.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?retrata_stat_id ?retrata_qid ?retrata_label ?retrata_descr (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?veste_qid,'@',?veste_label,'@',?veste_descr));separator=';%;') AS ?veste) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?usa_qid,'@',?usa_label,'@',?usa_descr));separator=';%;') AS ?usa) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?atributos_qid,'@',?atributos_label,'@',?atributos_descr));separator=';%;') AS ?atributos) WHERE { BIND(wd:QIDDAOBRA AS ?obra) BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?obra), 32) AS ?obra_qid) OPTIONAL { ?obra p:P180 ?retrata_aux. ?retrata_aux ps:P180 ?retrata_. {?retrata_ wdt:P31 wd:Q5.} UNION {?retrata_ wdt:P279* wd:Q5.} BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?retrata_aux), 42) AS ?retrata_stat_id) BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?retrata_), 32) AS ?retrata_qid) OPTIONAL {?retrata_aux pq:P3828 ?veste_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?veste_), 32 ) AS ?veste_qid)} OPTIONAL {?retrata_aux pq:P2283 ?usa_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?usa_), 32 ) AS ?usa_qid)} OPTIONAL {?retrata_aux pq:P1354 ?atributos_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?atributos_), 32 ) AS ?atributos_qid)} } SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE, pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?retrata_ rdfs:label ?retrata_label. ?retrata_ schema:description ?retrata_descr. ?veste_ rdfs:label ?veste_label. ?veste_ schema:description ?veste_descr. ?usa_ rdfs:label ?usa_label. ?usa_ schema:description ?usa_descr. ?atributos_ rdfs:label ?atributos_label. ?atributos_ schema:description ?atributos_descr.} } GROUP BY ?obra ?obra_qid ?retrata_ ?retrata_stat_id ?retrata_qid ?retrata_label ?retrata_descr
